attributes.additional_details:
Because after watching boris & Co today on the BCC news today the 5th of July 2021  about lifting the restrictions & saying that you have wear face masks on public transport because of passing covid 19 on to others when using public transport but you can go in to bars & night clubs indoors & you dont have to wear a masks or social distance in these places .... This is just like early 2020 when the government didnt lock down earlier enough & it  cost many people to loose lives & is going  repeating itself so to speak shut the gate when the horse has bolted .
I really do think Boris & co are out of order lifting restrictions to early & its all about money not life .
attributes.background: Keep restrictions in place due to an increase in new cases of covid 19 .

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Do not lift Covid-19 restrictions on 19th July
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590611

Keep face covering mandatory in indoor public settings beyond 19th July 2021
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590616
